name: MySQL5

getPSDEDataQueryCodeExps.expression: (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM ZT_BUG WHERE PRODUCT = t1.`ID` AND `STATUS` = 'active' AND DELETED = '0')
getPSDEDataQueryCodeExps.name: ACTIVEBUGCNT

getPSDEDataQueryCodeExps.expression: (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM ZT_STORY WHERE PRODUCT = t1.`ID` AND `STATUS`='active' AND DELETED = '0')
getPSDEDataQueryCodeExps.name: ACTIVESTORYCNT

getPSDEDataQueryCodeExps.expression: (select count(1) from zt_build t where t.product = t1.id and t.deleted = '0')
getPSDEDataQueryCodeExps.name: BUILDCNT

getPSDEDataQueryCodeExps.expression: (select count(1) from zt_case t where t.product = t1.id and t.deleted = '0')
getPSDEDataQueryCodeExps.name: CASECNT

getPSDEDataQueryCodeExps.expression: (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM ZT_STORY WHERE PRODUCT = t1.`ID` AND `STATUS`='changed' AND DELETED = '0')
getPSDEDataQueryCodeExps.name: CHANGEDSTORYCNT

getPSDEDataQueryCodeExps.expression: (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM ZT_STORY WHERE PRODUCT = t1.`ID` AND `STATUS`='closed' AND DELETED = '0')
getPSDEDataQueryCodeExps.name: CLOSEDSTORYCNT

getPSDEDataQueryCodeExps.expression: (select count(1) from zt_doc t where t.product = t1.id and t.deleted = '0')
getPSDEDataQueryCodeExps.name: DOCCNT

getPSDEDataQueryCodeExps.expression: (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM ZT_STORY WHERE PRODUCT = t1.`ID` AND `STATUS`='draft' AND DELETED = '0')
getPSDEDataQueryCodeExps.name: DRAFTSTORYCNT

getPSDEDataQueryCodeExps.expression: (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM ZT_BUG WHERE PRODUCT = t1.`ID` AND `STATUS` <> 'closed' AND DELETED = '0')
getPSDEDataQueryCodeExps.name: NOTCLOSEDBUGCNT

getPSDEDataQueryCodeExps.expression: (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM ZT_PRODUCTPLAN WHERE PRODUCT= t1.`ID` AND DELETED = '0')
getPSDEDataQueryCodeExps.name: PRODUCTPLANCNT

getPSDEDataQueryCodeExps.expression: (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM ZT_BUG WHERE PRODUCT = t1.`ID` AND DELETED = '0')
getPSDEDataQueryCodeExps.name: RELATEDBUGCNT

getPSDEDataQueryCodeExps.expression: (select count(1) from zt_projectproduct t inner join zt_project t2 on t2.id = t.project where t.product = t1.id and t2.deleted = '0')
getPSDEDataQueryCodeExps.name: RELATEDPROJECTS

getPSDEDataQueryCodeExps.expression: (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM ZT_RELEASE WHERE PRODUCT= t1.`ID` AND DELETED = '0')
getPSDEDataQueryCodeExps.name: RELEASECNT

getPSDEDataQueryCodeExps.expression: (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM ZT_BUG WHERE PRODUCT = t1.`ID` AND `CONFIRMED` = 0 AND DELETED = '0')
getPSDEDataQueryCodeExps.name: UNCONFIRMBUGCNT

queryCode:
SELECT
t1.`ACL`,
(SELECT COUNT(1) FROM ZT_BUG WHERE PRODUCT = t1.`ID` AND `STATUS` = 'active' AND DELETED = '0') AS `ACTIVEBUGCNT`,
(SELECT COUNT(1) FROM ZT_STORY WHERE PRODUCT = t1.`ID` AND `STATUS`='active' AND DELETED = '0') AS `ACTIVESTORYCNT`,
(select count(1) from zt_build t where t.product = t1.id and t.deleted = '0') AS `BUILDCNT`,
(select count(1) from zt_case t where t.product = t1.id and t.deleted = '0') AS `CASECNT`,
(SELECT COUNT(1) FROM ZT_STORY WHERE PRODUCT = t1.`ID` AND `STATUS`='changed' AND DELETED = '0') AS `CHANGEDSTORYCNT`,
(SELECT COUNT(1) FROM ZT_STORY WHERE PRODUCT = t1.`ID` AND `STATUS`='closed' AND DELETED = '0') AS `CLOSEDSTORYCNT`,
t1.`CODE`,
t1.`CREATEDBY`,
t1.`CREATEDDATE`,
t1.`CREATEDVERSION`,
t1.`DELETED`,
(select count(1) from zt_doc t where t.product = t1.id and t.deleted = '0') AS `DOCCNT`,
(SELECT COUNT(1) FROM ZT_STORY WHERE PRODUCT = t1.`ID` AND `STATUS`='draft' AND DELETED = '0') AS `DRAFTSTORYCNT`,
t1.`IBIZ_ID`,
t1.`ID`,
'0' AS `ISTOP`,
t1.`LINE`,
t11.`NAME` AS `LINENAME`,
t1.`MDEPTID`,
t1.`NAME`,
(SELECT COUNT(1) FROM ZT_BUG WHERE PRODUCT = t1.`ID` AND `STATUS` <> 'closed' AND DELETED = '0') AS `NOTCLOSEDBUGCNT`,
t1.`ORDER`,
t1.`order` AS `ORDER1`,
t1.`ORGID`,
t1.`PO`,
t1.PO AS `POPK`,
(SELECT COUNT(1) FROM ZT_PRODUCTPLAN WHERE PRODUCT= t1.`ID` AND DELETED = '0') AS `PRODUCTPLANCNT`,
t1.`QD`,
t1.QD AS `QDPK`,
t1.`RD`,
t1.RD AS `RDPK`,
(SELECT COUNT(1) FROM ZT_BUG WHERE PRODUCT = t1.`ID` AND DELETED = '0') AS `RELATEDBUGCNT`,
(select count(1) from zt_projectproduct t inner join zt_project t2 on t2.id = t.project where t.product = t1.id and t2.deleted = '0') AS `RELATEDPROJECTS`,
(SELECT COUNT(1) FROM ZT_RELEASE WHERE PRODUCT= t1.`ID` AND DELETED = '0') AS `RELEASECNT`,
t1.`STATUS`,
t1.`SUBSTATUS`,
t1.`TYPE`,
(SELECT COUNT(1) FROM ZT_BUG WHERE PRODUCT = t1.`ID` AND `CONFIRMED` = 0 AND DELETED = '0') AS `UNCONFIRMBUGCNT`,
t1.productsn
FROM `zt_product` t1 
LEFT JOIN zt_module t11 ON t1.LINE = t11.id
